identity.name: The Arena
identity.description: A high-contrast, dark-mode-first design system built for speed, precision, and the intensity of competitive sports. It eschews decorative gradients for functional clarity and 'broadcast-ready' aesthetics.

scale.scoreboard_number: text-[8rem] md:text-[12rem] font-bold leading-none tracking-tighter font-teko
scale.label: text-xs font-bold tracking-widest uppercase text-muted-foreground

layout_strategies.dashboard: Bento Grid (High Density). Use `grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4`. Widgets should be dense, data-heavy, and use 100% of the available height.
layout_strategies.tournament_list: Card Grid. Use `grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6`. Cards should have a 'tracing beam' hover effect.
layout_strategies.tournament_detail: Canvas Layout. The bracket view should be a horizontal scrollable canvas with sticky headers for rounds.
layout_strategies.live_game: Broadcast Overlay. Fullscreen, minimal chrome. Huge numbers. Dark background with slight transparency for video overlay simulation.
layout_strategies.spacing: Generous on marketing/landing pages (`p-12`, `p-24`), but Compact on dashboard (`p-4`, `p-6`) to maximize data visibility.

Card.style: bg-card border border-border/40 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300 rounded-xl shadow-none
Card.usage: Used for Tournament items, Player profiles, and Stat widgets.

ScoreBoard.style: bg-background/95 backdrop-blur supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-background/60 border-b border-border/40 sticky top-0 z-50
ScoreBoard.instructions: Must use the 'Teko' font for numbers. The serving player indicator must be a distinct colored dot (Red for TT, Lime for Badminton) next to the name.

Bracket.style: Custom SVG or Flexbox implementation. Lines must be smooth (bezier curves preferred, or orthogonal with rounded corners).
Bracket.instructions: Do not use a library if it is hard to style. A simple flexbox tree with 'connector' divs is often better.

StatusBadge.style: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

visual_enhancers.grain_texture: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")
visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: A moving gradient border effect for active cards.

login_background.description: Blurred indoor sports hall/gym floor. Use with a heavy dark overlay (opacity 80-90%) for the login screen background.

table_tennis_hero.description: Table tennis paddle on a blue table. Use for Table Tennis specific tournament headers.

badminton_hero.description: Badminton player at night. High contrast. Use for Badminton specific tournament headers.

leaderboard_hero.description: Gold and Silver medals. Use for the Leaderboard or Rankings page header.

do_not_use: Gradients on text (unless for specific 'hero' titles)
Light mode by default (unless user toggles)
Default browser scrollbars (customize them to be thin and dark)
must_do: Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all uppercase headings.
Ensure the 'Live Score' view is readable from 10 feet away (large text).
Use Skeleton loaders for all data-fetching states.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure all text on dark backgrounds has at least 4.5:1 contrast. Avoid using color alone to convey state (e.g., use icons + color for 'Winner').

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install the required fonts in `public/index.html` immediately.
2. Configure `tailwind.config.js` with the colors and font families specified.
3. Set up the `ThemeProvider` to default to 'dark'.
4. When building the 'Bracket' component, prioritize a CSS Grid/Flex approach over complex D3 libraries unless necessary for animation.
5. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Do not use placeholders.
6. For the Dashboard, create a 'Bento Grid' layout using `col-span` classes.
